about.description: My name is Arthur LY, and I'm a student in my second year of a BTECH, specializing in Software Solutions and Business Applications (SLAM). Passionate about the creative world of programming, application development and video games, I have focused my academic career on acquiring advanced skills in the design, deployment and maintenance of software solutions.

projects.title: ADP - Automatic Data Processing
projects.description: As a member of the R&D team, I undertook a project to redesign the home page. I created an Oracle database to optimize information storage, and established the link between the newly created database and the web server using servlets. At the same time, I extended the functionalities by introducing key elements such as bookmark management and a history.

experience.company: AAE - Academy of Air and Space
experience.title: Second year BTS SIO internship
experience.description: Mobile application design and website development

experience.title: First year BTECH internship
experience.description: Redesign of the home page of R&D tools and their environments.

experience.title: Internship
experience.description: Discover all the activities and services of a large company
